name: 蒼葉
message: "...Haa, haah... Haa."
...Shit.
My head feels like it's going to explode.
It even hurts to breathe.
...But.
Noiz peers into my face.
Akushima is sprawled out beside him, unconscious.
Somehow, I made it in time...

name: 蒼葉
message: "You're okay..."
Thank goodness...
But Noiz is glaring at me, his eyes dark with fury.

name: ノイズ
message: "Your voice just now..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "What about it?"

name: ノイズ
message: "It's the same as when you beat me... So, you can do it."

name: ノイズ
message: "'I don't remember,' my ass. You've been bullshitting me this whole time. You can use it. That's how you beat me at Rhyme."

name: ノイズ
message: "Fight me already. Rematch. Right now."
Noiz pins my shoulders to the ground.
I can't do anything. The quiet fury in his eyes holds me in place.

name: ノイズ
message: "Now."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I told you, I can't...!"
I really don't want to use it any more than I have to. I only used it here because I didn't have a choice.

name: ノイズ
message: "Do it."

name: 蒼葉
message: "I told you! I can't!"
Noiz pushes my shoulders harder into the ground. My face twists in pain as my bones grind against the pavement.
Why... Why is this happening? I was just trying to help him...
I didn't do it expecting any kind of reward.
But why does he always get to shove his demands down my throat?!
Unable to bear it anymore, I open my mouth to shout.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Well what about you?! Why're you so hung up on me?!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Because of Rhyme? Because you lost a fucking Rhyme match?! How stupid is that?!"
Noiz's eyes grow cold and dark.

name: ノイズ
message: "...Then stop trying to help me."

name: ノイズ
message: "Maybe you get off on saving me or some shit, but if I'd died back there, it would've been my own damn fault."

name: ノイズ
message: "I'm the one who picked a fight with him. It was none of your damn business."

name: ノイズ
message: "But you helped anyway. Why? Why help me if you're just gonna bitch later? You're the one who makes no fucking sense."

name: ノイズ
message: "You know exactly what I want, but you won't give it to me."

name: ノイズ
message: "Instead, you save me and do all sorts of other crazy shit. What the hell's the point?"

name: ノイズ
message: "Well, I guess it's better having me around so you can use me. Or maybe you just wanna fuck me, I don't know."

name: ノイズ
message: "Either way, I don't give a shit. I don't want your charity."

name: 蒼葉
message: "...Haha."
Dry laughter spills from my lips.
This shit again? I can't believe it. I just keep him around to use him? Fuck him?
Is that the kind of person he thinks I am?
Did he kiss me out of the blue like that because he thought I wanted to get in his pants?
...I can't even feel annoyed anymore.

name: 蒼葉
message: "...That's how you look at me?"

name: ノイズ
message: "What other way is there?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Plenty. People help each other for all kinds of reasons―like out of concern, or because they just like each other."

name: ノイズ
message: "Yeah, right."
Noiz dismisses the notion outright.

<4line><voice name='ノイズ' class='ノイズ' src='voice/dm22/5000360a03'>
"People only help each other when they want something. That's the only reason to do anything that doesn't benefit you directly. Because you think it'll benefit you indirectly."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Wrong."

What a messed up way to think about the world.
Actually, it's kind of sad.

name: 蒼葉
message: "I guess I feel better when you're around, but that's not the same thing as keeping you around to use you."

name: 蒼葉
message: "And I'm absolutely not trying to fuck you. Do you seriously think I have time for that right now?"

name: ノイズ
message: "Same difference. You feel better when I'm around 'cause I'm useful."

name: 蒼葉
message: "No. It's not like that. I just... worry about you. I feel like I can't abandon you or something... That's all it is."

name: ノイズ
message: "Hate to break it to you, but I'm way stronger than you."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You think I don't know that? That's not what I'm talking about. This isn't about who's stronger in a fight."
Frustrated that I can't find the right words, I reach up to grab Noiz's hand and hold it against my shoulder.
Noiz tries to pull away, but I don't let him.

name: 蒼葉
message: "If I saw someone hurt, I'd try to help them no matter who they were. Even if they weren't useful at all."

name: 蒼葉
message: "You don't need a reason to help someone. It's just the right thing to do."

name: ノイズ
message: "If you don't have a reason, then why did you bandage me up? Why do that unless you gain something?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "How many times do I have to say it before it gets through your thick skull?! I'm not looking to gain anything!"

name: ノイズ
message: "...I don't get it. I don't get you at all. You're like some kinda alien or something."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah, well, you seem pretty weird to me too."
When I let go of his hand, Noiz gets off me with a sour look on his face.
It seems like his anger has subsided. For the moment, at least.
Now that I can relax, my headache returns with a vengeance.

name: ノイズ
message: "...Let's get one thing straight. This isn't over. One way or another, you're gonna fight me."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah."
I stand, locking eyes with Noiz, and nod.
Regardless of everything else, Noiz helped me save Granny. I owe him for that.
Plus, I can't keep running from the issue. There's no denying that I've played Rhyme before.
When the time comes... I'll give him what he wants.
